session

Class Session

  • java.lang.Object
    • session.Session

  • public class Session
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Session it's a class that represents a session of brainstorming with some informations encapsulated.
    Version:
    2018.06.15
    Author:
    Lu√≠s Eduardo (cruxiu@ufrn.edu.br)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Session(User owner, java.lang.String description)
      Creates a new Session object given the parameters a User owner, a String description and initializes a empty list of participants and ideas and their respectively hash codes.

        public Session(User owner,
               java.lang.String description)
        Creates a new Session object given the parameters a User owner, a String description and initializes a empty list of participants and ideas and their respectively hash codes.
        Parameters:
        owner - A User that represents the owner of this session of brainstorming.
        description - A String that represents the description of this session of brainstorming.
